backend/main.mo: Defines actor types for lobbies, tournaments, players, transactions, and Omaha/Spades game state, using various core and storage modules.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking wallet‑related fixes to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing hooks, components, styles, and wallet/game logic.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app shell handling identity, admin checks, profile setup, routing via tabs, and game launching with Web3 wallet context.
frontend/src/components/AdminSettings.ts: Admin panel UI with live publish status, placeholder system stats, and house‑cut configuration awaiting backend support.
frontend/src/components/BackendConnectiv: UI badge showing backend connectivity status with retry feedback using useActorWithRetry.
frontend/src/components/DepositWithdrawM: Modal handling deposits via Web3 wallet, including validation, status polling, and initiating Flexa deposit intents.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/GoLiveHelp.tsx: UI card explaining how to publish an app live on the Internet Computer and where to find ICP gateway links.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with game mode selection and wallet controls, including connect, disconnect, deposit, and withdraw options.
frontend/src/components/LivePublishStatu: Displays current site origin, ICP public link, and build metadata with copy and refresh actions.
frontend/src/components/LobbyBrowser.tsx: Lobby selection interface offering Quick Play options for Spades and Omaha depending on game mode.
frontend/src/components/LobbyRoom.tsx: Stub lobby room component showing a placeholder message for under‑development multiplayer rooms.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting users to create a profile, supporting both online (IC) and offline modes with local or backend storage.
frontend/src/components/QuickPlayGame.ts: Manages quick-play sessions for Spades or Omaha, initializing games and rendering the appropriate game UI. Includes embedded Spades game logic for bidding, card play, and trick display.
frontend/src/components/spades/SpadesSco: Renders a Spades scoreboard in compact or full mode, showing scores, last-hand changes, and reneging penalties.
frontend/src/components/TournamentSectio: Displays a tournaments overview with badges and descriptive text, adapting content based on whether the user is in for-fun or for-real mode.
frontend/src/components/WalletConnectMod: Provides a WalletConnect connection modal with QR code generation, deep links, error handling, and embedded-browser warnings.
frontend/src/components/WalletInstallMod: Shows a modal prompting users to install a browser wallet, offering links to Coinbase Wallet and MetaMask with guidance for setup.
frontend/src/components/WalletPickerModa: Allows users to choose a wallet type to connect, handling connection attempts, errors, and available wallet options.
frontend/src/components/WalletSection.ts: Displays wallet status, connection flow, errors, and options to open picker or deposit/withdraw, with special handling for embedded browsers.
Provides a React context for Web3 wallet state and actions, exposing connection, network, and wallet management functions.
frontend/src/games/omaha/bots.ts: Implements simple Omaha bot logic choosing fold, check, call, or bet actions based on basic probabilities and game state.
frontend/src/games/omaha/engine.ts: Defines Omaha game setup, deck creation, shuffling, hand initialization, and basic action rules like check and call.
frontend/src/games/omaha/handEvaluator.t: Evaluates Omaha hands by checking all valid 5‑card combinations and ranks hands for winner determination.
frontend/src/games/omaha/OmahaCommunityB: Displays Omaha community cards with reveal logic based on betting street and a fallback when cards are unavailable.
frontend/src/games/omaha/types.ts: Contains type definitions for Omaha cards, players, game state, and helper functions for suit colors and card text.
frontend/src/games/session/quickPlaySess: Manages Spades and Omaha quick‑play sessions, initializing games and routing player and bot actions to the correct engine.
frontend/src/games/spades/bots.ts: Implements Spades bot bidding and card‑play logic, choosing legal plays and estimating bids from hand strength.
frontend/src/games/spades/engine.ts: Implements Spades game setup, deck creation, shuffling, dealing, bidding, and hand reset logic.
frontend/src/games/spades/scoring.ts: Defines scoring rules for Spades hands, target score checking, and winner determination.
frontend/src/games/spades/types.ts: Provides type definitions for Spades cards, players, tricks, penalties, and game state helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithRetry.ts: Wraps useActor with connection/error tracking and retry state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, providing identity state, login, and logout within a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for user profiles, canister metadata, and Flexa deposit operations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuickPlaySession.t: React hook managing quick-play game sessions, handling bot actions, bids, and card plays for Spades and Omaha. Includes safety caps and state synchronization with async processing.
frontend/src/hooks/useWalletConnect.ts: Manages WalletConnect session lifecycle including initialization, connection flow, approval handling, errors, and cancellation. Syncs state for UI and exposes connect, disconnect, and balance functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeb3Wallet.ts: Unified Web3 wallet manager combining injected wallets, WalletConnect, and guest wallets. Tracks connection state, balances, chain ID, and handles network switching and wallet detection.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color themes, dark mode, gradients, scrollbars, and card UI animations.
frontend/src/lib/walletconnect.ts: Custom WalletConnect client wrapper handling initialization, session restoration, connection, and error mapping using SignClient.
frontend/src/lib/web3modal.ts: Placeholder config for Web3Modal with Base chain metadata and static wallet metadata.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point rendering App with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/types/qrcode.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for QR code typing.
frontend/src/utils/ethFormat.ts: Utility functions for safely parsing and formatting ETH values using BigInt and fixed decimal output.
frontend/src/utils/icpLinks.ts: Provides helpers to detect the current site origin, resolve the canister ID from multiple sources, build a public IC gateway URL, and copy text to the clipboard.
frontend/src/utils/isEmbedded.ts: Detects whether the app is running inside an iframe and provides a helper to open the current URL in a new tab.
frontend/src/utils/sleep.ts: Implements a simple promise-based sleep function for delaying actions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including hash-based routing support and sessionStorage persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme colors, layout, animations, and including typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, known issues, existing feature requests, and versioned state information for the Crypto Cards project.
